description.value:
This exquisite fiddle is perfectly carved and balanced to produce the purest sound while granting its player perfect balance and poise. It grants a +2 item bonus to Performance checks. If you're a master in Performance, while playing it you also gain a +1 status bonus to Reflex saves and a +1 item bonus to Dexterity-based skill checks. If you're legendary in Performance, the bonuses are +2.

When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Perform] with the fiddle, you can choose to create a harsh and discordant note. You critically fail the Performance check, shred the strings of the fiddle, and create an 8th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sound Burst], with a @Template[type:emanation|distance:40] around you instead of a @Template[type:burst|distance:10]. The fiddle can't be played again until the strings are replaced at a cost of 200 gp.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from this instrument to cast a spell from its list.

    • Cantrips@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dancing Lights], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ghost Sound], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Message]
    • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Command]
    • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Calm Emotions], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Faerie Fire]
    • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Enthrall]
    • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Glibness]
    • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sending]
    • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Calm Emotions], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dominate], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Vibrant Pattern]
    • 7th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dominate], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Prismatic Spray], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.True Target], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Vibrant Pattern], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Visions of Danger]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
